1:
Ho anao ‘zay manan’olana saro-bahana, 
Tsy mahita atao ; mazana alaim-panahy, 
Voatari-dalana hanompo zavatra 
‘Lay hazo fijaliany no aoka hatrehinao
Fa teo no namahana
1..1:
‘zay rehetra toa anao 
‘Zahay mahatsaro anao, 
Mivavaka ho anao
1.1:
Ho anao lavo fanahy na nosoparana 
Tsy resy hianao na very,
Tsy resy hianao hoy aho 
fa misy ny azo atao
Jeso koa tia anao
1.1.1:
Manambitamby anao monolo-Tanana
Jeso mpiady mahery
Tsy irery akory hianao (Solo), 
‘Zahay mahatsiaro anao 
Mivavaka ho anao
2:
Ho anao ‘lay niova fo
Fa resy lahatra amin’ny filazantsara 
He sambatra hianao
Fa ny ao an-danitra ao mifaly aminao 
Ny vavaka no ataovy tsy mitsahatra 
Ka mifahara tsara,
2..1:
Zahay rehetra toa anao, 
zahay mahatsiaro anao 
Mivavaka ho anao
2.1:
He faly ery ny Ray 
fa hita ilay very hatrizay
Voasoratra ny anaranao
Ny lamba soa no atafy anao
Ny fitahiny anie 
hameno anao na aiza aleha
Tsy irery akory hianao
Mivavaka ho anao
2.1.1:
Tsy irery akory hianao
Mivavaka ho anao
Mivavaka ho anao (Solo) x 2
Mivavaka ho anao (Miaraka) x 2
